title: FIFA 22 cross-play test coming to Stadia, Xbox Series S/X, and PS5
content:
EA looks set to bring cross-platform versus play support to FIFA 22 on Stadia, Xbox Series S/X, and PS5 with the confirmation of a cross-play test process.

moreâ€¦

The post FIFA 22 cross-play test coming to Stadia, Xbox Series S/X, and PS5 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: EA is set to test cross-play support for FIFA 22 across multiple platforms including Stadia, Xbox Series S and X, plus Playstation 5.
